tutorial_talks.content: Great news, kupo! I've done it!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I've found a way to make Hero Records even stronger!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That's great, Dr. Mog! How does it work?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_surprise

tutorial_talks.content: That's the best part, kupo! All you need is Memory Crystals!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I call it...breaking the cap! It's flawless, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Er, except a character has to be at max level before you can break the cap...but other than that, it's flawless!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Once you've broken a character's level cap, they'll be able to use a new power, kupo: Record Materia.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Just equipping Record Materia gives you all kinds of advantages in battle, kupo.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: You get one Record Materia when you break a character's level cap, kupo, and another by taking those characters along with you to battle!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I get it. Hmm, but how to decide who I should equip with what Record Materia?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: Don't worry about that now, kupo! Get out there, find some Memory Crystals, and break some level caps!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Memory Crystals...you mean one of these?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_laugh

tutorial_talks.content: I knew there was a reason you were my star pupil, kupo! Now raise a character to max level, break a level cap, and try out a Record Materia!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle
